data.message: Sir I am from India.there are many fans of you like me who treat you as a god.you are respected so much here.we all want to see you perform in our country at least once in our life time.we will wait sir.your journey and life inspires crores of youngsters like me.so please manage to come in India at least once.we assure you that we will not give you any chance to complain for anything...we will wait for you...

replies.message: Hey Eminem..if this does not touch you, then i don't know what else will..Thanks  Soumyajit Saha..you spoke your heart..God Bless..
